Text: Messages of the Season from Bob Sherrer Chairman and President o f Tom JamesThroughout this holiday season we have been reminded by press and media of the changes to our lives normality because of the events these last few months When we travel we observe uniformed soldiers and added security that tell us our way of living and business conduct has forever changed The messages of this holiday season Hope Peace Love and Joy have significant meaning All our hearts desire these feelings to endure Perhaps like never before we should commit to be instruments that bring Hope Peace Love and Joy to our country and to our world Our faith in those principles and ideas that have carried us and made us great has been renewed Our resolve to make a difference in every endeavor has been strengthened We know we will get better after being in the valley of adversity and trial Tom James Company and all our employees across the United States the United Kingdom Japan and Holland join me in thanking you for your business in We have been tested and we are strengthened Our partners who call on you are better equipped entering than ever before to serve you We have significantly added quality products in all our price points and expanded our casual wear The addition in of the finest footwear made in the world has given us the highest quality footwear product available Our partners in our factories have been touched by the events of September th and after Most of our manufacturing facilities are in the Northeast part of the United States Tom James like so many others experienced loss So going forward forever in our memories will be the faces and pictures of Our commitment to you is to be better and our obligation to life is to give back to life with what we are and who we become Your patronage is very important to Tom James Please let us know when we do not perform to your expectation Our guarantee is satisfaction We live by our creed Thank you for helping us enjoy a fine year We will pursue excellence in serving you our valued client Best wishes for your continued health happiness and prosperity in the New Year Happy Holidays Respect and Regards Robert F Sherrer Chairman and President Tom James Company
